DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety tri-weekly ABI-007 recurrence unresectable gastric cancer patient receive one prior regimen contain fluoropyrimidine develop disease progression recurrence .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study ABI-007 Gastric Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm gastric adenocarcinoma Received one prior regimen contain fluoropyrimidine analog develop disease progression recurrence Age : 20 74 At least one measurable lesion RECIST criterion History Taxans use Patients another active malignancy Preexisting peripheral neuropathy Grade 2 , 3 , 4 ( per CTCAE ) Chronic treatment steroid
